Texts.Chs:
将使用者传送至至位于噩梦世界的^orange;极暗电子人城塞^reset;
^red;环境危害^reset;:
极端闪电风暴
极端辐射
极端以大大气
致疯大气
Texts.Eng:
Teleports the user to the ^orange;Dark Glitch Keep^reset; in the Nightmare World.
^red;Environmental Hazards^reset;:
Extreme Electrical Storms
Extreme Radiation
Extreme Aetheric Atmosphere
Maddening Atmosphere
